Package index

Hospital-Specific Reports (HSR)

Functions for extracting and analyzing data from CMS Hospital-Specific Reports.

hsr_coefficients()
Extract risk model coefficients from a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)
hsr_cohort_summary()
Extract cohort summary information from a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)
hsr_discharges()
Extract discharge-level data from a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)
hsr_dual_stays()
Extract dually-eligible discharges from a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)
hsr_mock_reports()
Retrieve file location of mock Hospital-Specific Reports (HSR)
hsr_payment_summary() hsr_count_dual_stays() hsr_count_total_stays() hsr_dual_proportion() hsr_peer_group() hsr_neutrality_modifier() hsr_payment_adjustment_factor() hsr_payment_penalty()
Extract payment summary information from a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)
hsr_readmission_risks()
Compute discharge-level readmission risks in a Hospital-Specific Report (HSR)

Provider Data Catalog (PDC)

Functions for importing data from the CMS Provider Data Catalog.

pdc_read() pdc_datasets() pdc_topics()
Import datasets from the Provider Data Catalog (PDC)

Hospital Readmissions Reduction Program (hrrp)

Datasets and functions for extracting key dates from the Hospital Readmissions Reduction Program (HRRP)

hrrp_get_dates()
Find relevant dates from the Hospital Readmissions Reduction Program (HRRP)
hrrp_keydates hrrp_performance_periods hrrp_payment_periods hrrp_review_periods hrrp_snapshot_dates hrrp_cohort_inclusion
Key dates from the Hospital Readmissions Reduction Program (HRRP)
